name: HeadcanonDreaming
0:
”Alexa, open Headcanon Dreaming”
”Alexa, start Headcanon Dreaming”
”Alexa, launch Headcanon Dreaming”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: headcanon dreaming
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We’ll ask you to name three things: an exotic animal, an interesting job, and a lifelong dream someone might have. Once we have the answers, you’ll hear Kendra’s tale of inspiration. And who knows? You just might learn something about your own dreams along the way.

This skill is great fun with a group! Get the group to agree upon the answers, give them to Headcanon Dreaming, and enjoy the resulting story of inspiration. You can play it again and again with different answers, too!

*Headcanon Dreaming was first built for Reinventing Storytelling, an event series produced by Headcanon.com in partnership with Schoolab, the global, Paris-based accelerator, consulting, and co-working network. In the inaugural San Francisco event, the audience supplied the answers and we collaborative built Kendra’s story. It was a sublime experience, and great fun for all!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
